name: Empty The Station
description:
WASD to move / Mouse to aim and shoot

Collect resources from defeated enemies to craft stronger weapons and armor.

Are you ready to empty the spaceship from the corrupted robots? these robots need to be shot down from a green fella. Are you that green fella?

Made by Me and ChristianBackan For JamCraft 7.

Tiles: https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/tech-dungeon-roguelite

Player sprites: https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/outer-buddies

 Enemy Sprites: https://mounirtohami.itch.io/26-animated-pixelart-robots
